name: Panther Shooting Simulator
description:
Become ultimate hunter and take out these beasts and load out your weapons and get your 5 star shooting fix. Ride on animal and aim for the best shot and shoot from the animal. Some animals may counter attack. Target all scums in the safari and kill them before they find you be careful of being sieged. Can you survive in sniper games as the top shot? Play the role of a stealth huntsman.

FEATURES
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Gameplay is simple yet entertaining.
- Efficient sniper gun control.
- True to life hunting experience.
- High fidelity cool graphics.
- Immersive 3D graphics.
